attributes.action: Make car insurance cheaper. Especially for new young drivers.
attributes.additional_details:
Driving at a young age is almost impossible. After paying around £1500 for your driving tests and exams you will have to pay an additional £4000 a year to insure a cheap 1.2 litre car that’s worth only £1000 pretty outrageous if you ask me. 
Elder drivers which are more prone to accidents are being offered much cheaper rates which is not very fair as a new driver has just passed there driving exam and ready to go on the road.
attributes.background: Force insurance companies to quote cheaper to younger drivers

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067

Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
